text.0: Stress is a factor in all of our lives; learn how mindfulness meditation can control chronic stress, which takes a toll on our psychological and physical well-being. #TomorrowsDiscoveries https://t.co/xFevPUSERu
text.1:
.@HopkinsMedicine gynecologist Khara Simpson will present at the Nov. 7 @awomansjoruney event. She will share details about prevalence & disparities regarding fibroids among Black women, early symptoms, risks associated w/ fibroids & status of treatments.
https://t.co/3nvBqfHRC1 https://t.co/jn3RJj7dIy
text.2: #Hotflashes keeping you up at night? Learn how #menopause can affect sleep & what you can do about it: https://t.co/woZbcU0rCD
text.3: What can I learn from genetic kits like 23 and me? Why is it important to know my family history? Get all your questions answered by our genetic counselors during our live Twitter chat Nov 12, 2pm-4pm right here. Tweet us your questions with the hashtag #GCADatHopkins or DM us! https://t.co/UPbUnRBBij

text.5:
On Sat, Nov. 7 @awomansjourney will host an annual virtual webinar. Speaker topics include #COVID-19, structural racism, fibroids among Black women, how fasting may affect brain, cancer, dementia, heart disease & stress and anxiety. #HopkinsAWJ 
Register https://t.co/B1GgSY6UC4 https://t.co/dvuVATw9mu
text.6: Just heard great talk by @FabianJohnston at @HopkinsMedicine @hopkinssurgery Grand Rounds. Many lessons about #Diversity #Inclusion #Equity #BlackMenInMedicine #StructuralRacism #HealthDisparities #SurgMentoring #MicroAggressions #Allyship #Antiracism https://t.co/qv8QIVrrk0
text.7: Let the games begin!! ⁦@HopkinsMedicine⁩ #icurehab conference 2020, We are virtual this year from the “DOME” Let’s get ready to rummmmmmmmmbbbbbbleeeeee! #everyBODYmoves https://t.co/q48xpBJPjA
text.8: “We can’t control our genes, we can’t control how many X chromosomes we were born with, but we can control our behaviors” said Erin Michos @HopkinsMedicine “A lot of this can be mitigated by behavioral habits. Not smoking, hand washing, mask wearing” https://t.co/VkXq5ux7W2 @WSJ
